page.shortlink: api a5storage getitem as file function source
page.description: Retrieves data from an item in storage, including files stored in Amazon S3 or Azure, and creates a local file
page.prototype: L a5Storage_getItem_as_file(C connectionString ,C itemName ,C fileName [,* pResult ])

argument.name: connectionString
argument.description: Storage connection string with ::storage:: as a prefix.

argument.name: itemName
argument.description: The item to retrieve from storage.

argument.name: fileName
argument.description: The name and path of the local file to create.

argument.name: pResult
argument.description: An optional dot variable that you can pass in that will be populated with information about the object.

description.p: The *[xb:a5Storage_getItem_as_file]* function retrieves an item from storage and creates a local file. For example, assume you wanted to retrieve 'Image1.jpg' which has been uploaded to S3 with the Authenticated read property turned on, you could perform an Ajax callback that executed the example below to retrieve the file and save it locally as a file called "c:\myfiles\Image1.jpg".
